sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.sc_ic_ItemStagingSecurityManager</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Security manager for the sc_ic_item_staging table</description>
        <name>sc_ic_ItemStagingSecurityManager</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var sc_ic_ItemStagingSecurityManager = Class.create();

sc_ic_ItemStagingSecurityManager.prototype = Object.extendsObject(sc_ic_SecurityManager,{
	initialize: function(_gr,_gs) {
		sc_ic_SecurityManager.prototype.initialize.call(this,_gr,_gs);
	},

	canCreate: function() {
		return gs.hasRole(sc_.CATALOG_ADMIN) || gs.hasRole(sc_ic.CATALOG_MANAGER) || gs.hasRole(sc_ic.CATALOG_EDITOR);
	},
	
	canRead: function() {
		var item = sc_ic_Factory.wrap(this._gr);
		
		if (item.isAdmin())
			return true;

		if (!gs.hasRole(sc_ic.CATALOG_MANAGER) && !gs.hasRole(sc_ic.CATALOG_EDITOR)) {
			return false;
		}
			
		if (this._gr.isNewRecord())
			return true;

		var itemCategories = this._gr[sc_ic.CATEGORIES] + "";
		if (JSUtil.nil(itemCategories))
			return false;
		
		var itemCategoriesArr = itemCategories.split(",");
		
		var availableCategoryIds = item.getUsersAvailableCategories();
		var availableCategoriesObj = {};
		for (var i = 0; i < availableCategoryIds.length; i++)
			availableCategoriesObj[availableCategoryIds[i]] = true;
		
		for (var i = 0; i < itemCategoriesArr.length; i++)
			if (availableCategoriesObj[itemCategoriesArr[i]])
				return true;
		
		return false;
	},
	
	canUpdate: function() {
		var item = sc_ic_Factory.wrap(this._gr);

		if (!item.accessibleInDomain())
			return false;

		if (gs.hasRole(sc_.CATALOG_ADMIN))
			return true;

		return this.canRead();
	},
	
	canPublish: function() {
		if(!this._gr.isInSelectedScope())
			return false;
			
		if(!this._gr.isInGlobalScope()) {
			if(!gs.hasRole("admin")) {
				gs.warn(gs.getMessage("Only admin can publish the service '{0}' because its in the scoped application '{1}'", [this._gr.name.toString(), this._gr.sys_scope.name.toString()]));
				return false;
			}
		}
	
		var item = sc_ic_Factory.wrap(this._gr);
		if (item.createdFromServiceCreator()) {
			var roles = gs.getProperty("glide.service_creator.publish_roles", "admin,catalog_admin,catalog_manager");
			if (!gs.hasRole(roles))
				return false;
		}
		
		return this.canUpdate();
	},
	
	canDelete: function() {
		var item = sc_ic_Factory.wrap(this._gr);
		if (item.createdFromServiceCreator())
			return gs.hasRole(sc_.CATALOG_ADMIN) || gs.hasRole(sc_ic.CATALOG_MANAGER) || gs.hasRole(sc_ic.CATALOG_EDITOR);

		if (!item.accessibleInDomain())
			return false;
	    return gs.hasRole("admin");
	},
	
	type: 'sc_ic_ItemStagingSecurityManager'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>nigel.bell</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-03-04 08:05:45</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>713051fceb1311003623666cd206fee3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>sc_ic_ItemStagingSecurityManager</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_713051fceb1311003623666cd206fee3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-01-31 11:56:23</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>2387</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
